name: Pariah (itch) (Tom Griffin)
description:
Life in the city isn't easy. Most orphans end up joining local gangs to survive, or get captured and are drafted into the army. Young Rainey tries her best to survive on the street, while finding something she can call family. But, even if she succeeds, can she hold onto what she's found when the world comes crashing in? 

Pariah is a short, single player, surreal narrative adventure exploring the life of a young girl as she grows into adulthood, experiencing love, loss, war, addiction, and more.
